requirements.summary: Deploy Draft Version 14 to production environment with data preservation
acceptanceCriteria: Draft Version 14 is successfully published to production
All client data, photos, and interventions remain intact after publication
The production deployment is accessible to users

file_operations.description: Update manifest version metadata to reflect Draft Version 14 publication. Increment version number to indicate production release status.
Remove or disable any development-only console logging statements to ensure clean production deployment. Verify that all debugging console.log calls are removed from the main application entry point.
Remove extensive console logging for debugging that was mentioned in file summary. Clean up debug statements to prepare for production deployment.
Remove extensive logging mentioned in file summary. Ensure production-ready error handling without verbose debug output.
Remove comprehensive logging for debugging mentioned in file summary. Prepare hook for production use with minimal necessary logging.
